title: The Indiscriminate Rain of Cluster Bombs
description:
The U.S. sent cluster munitions to Ukraine, and Vladimir Putin warns “the right to take reciprocal action.”

The post The Indiscriminate Rain of Cluster Bombs appeared first on The Intercept.

title: Wanted for Murder, an Army Vet Escaped to Ukraine — and Fought the Russians
description:
Facing extradition to Florida, Craig Lang joined an ultranationalist militia in Ukraine after Russia invaded in 2022.

The post Wanted for Murder, an Army Vet Escaped to Ukraine — and Fought the Russians appeared first on The Intercept.

title: Atlanta City Leaders Are Subverting Democracy to Save Cop City
description:
With a referendum against the police facility in the works, Atlanta is making sure it won’t be valid. Activists have other ways to fight.

The post Atlanta City Leaders Are Subverting Democracy to Save Cop City appeared first on The Intercept.
